newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Death toll 33 Arabs, 10 Israelis at 1400 gmt.
newsitem.headline: Death toll 33 Arabs, 10 Israelis at 1400 gmt.

text.p: Israeli troops shot dead 28 Palestinians in clashes on Thursday and Palestinian forces killed 10 Israelis, Palestinian medical sources and Israel Radio said.

The Palestinian sources said 18 Palestinians were killed in the Gaza Strip and 10 in the West Bank. Israel Radio said 10 Israelis were killed in the clashes on Thursday. The death toll from two days of violence is 33 Palestinians and 10 Israelis.
